Data.Name: AtTheGateOfThePlagueKingNoComment
Data.Text: The time for talk is done Mr. Moody.\n\nYield or perish!

Data.Name: AtTheGateOfThePlagueKing
Data.Text: You stand at the gate of the Plague King.

Data.Name: AtTheGateOfThePlagueKing_1_p2
Data.Text: Your viral campaign is finished Mr. Plague King.

Data.Name: AtTheGateOfThePlagueKing_1_p3
Data.Text: *lie* This is the public health commission. There have been complaints about spore clouds. Please let us in.

Data.Name: AtTheGateOfThePlagueKing_2_k2
Data.Text: Come on up and we'll make some fungi sausage together.

Data.Name: AtTheGateOfThePlagueKing_2_k3
Data.Text: I think you have a wrong address. Please try next door.
